name: Alice the Wanderer

skills.name: Vorpal Sword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target has any active skills on cooldown. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: Double hit. Extra hit if target has skill on cooldown. Each hit can reduce buff duration.

skills.notes: Extra hit triggers if target has any skill on cooldown. Each hit can reduce buff duration.

skills.name: Clockwork Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of increasing the cooldowns of all enemy skills by 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of decreasing the target’s Turn Meter by 15%. If at least one of a target’s skills has its cooldown increased to the max, decreases their Turn Meter by 30% instead.

effects.notes: AoE. TM reduction is doubled if skill cooldown is maxed.

skills.notes: Turn Meter reduction is doubled if skill cooldown is maxed.

skills.name: Queenslayer
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 20% of the target’s DEF. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP. Will also ignore 20% of the target’s DEF.

effects.notes: Single target. Ignores 20% DEF. If first target is killed, chains to lowest HP enemy. Both hits ignore 20% DEF.

skills.notes: If first target is killed, chains to lowest HP enemy. Both hits ignore 20% DEF.

skills.name: Tick Tock
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Whenever this Champion attacks, inflicts 3% bonus damage to each target for each turn remaining on all of their skill’s cooldowns. [Active Effect] Resets the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills each time they kill an enemy. Occurs once per skill.
skills.notes: Synergizes with A2 for bonus damage. Kill resets one skill cooldown (once per skill).

forms.aura: Increases Ally ATK in All Battles by 30%
forms.comments: Strong control and nuker. Excels in Arena and Doom Tower.

clan_boss: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (critical for A1 2-3 hit)
Support: Pinpoint Accuracy, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye (TM control synergy), Lore of Steel
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Cycle of Violence (cooldown reduction on high damage), Kill Streak, GIANT SLAYER (A1 multi-hit)
Support: Pinpoint Accuracy, Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory (speed nuke), Shield Breaker, Ruthless Ambush (+8% first hit), Single Out, Cycle of Violence, Kill Streak, Helmsmasher (stacks with A3 ignore 20% DEF)
Support: Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for cooldown increase), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Cycle of Violence, Kill Streak, GIANT SLAYER (A1 multi-hit) or Helmsmasher
Defense: Blastproof, Improved Parry, Delay Death
Support: Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Cycle of Violence, Kill Streak, GIANT SLAYER (A1 multi-hit)
Support: Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel
general: - GIANT SLAYER: A1 is 2-3 hit attack (2 base + 1 extra if target has skill on cooldown) → multi-proc synergy for PVE bosses
- Helmsmasher: Arena nuke builds → stacks additively with A3 ignore 20% DEF (total 45% DEF ignore)
- Cycle of Violence: 30% chance to reduce cooldown when damage exceeds 30% of target MAX HP → synergizes with passive cooldown reset on kill
- Kill Streak: +6% damage per kill (max +12%) → snowball damage in waves
- Eagle Eye + Pinpoint Accuracy: High ACC required for A2 cooldown increase (75% chance) and TM manipulation
- Evil Eye: A1 TM control synergy (-20% single-target or -5% AoE)
ARENA PRIORITY: Helmsmasher for DEF ignore stacking (45% total with A3)
PVE PRIORITY: Giant Slayer for A1 multi-hit proc synergy

mechanics_advisory: Alice the Wanderer is a top-tier attack champion for control and nuking. A1 is 2-3 hit attack (2 base + 1 extra if target has skill on cooldown) → benefits from Giant Slayer in PVE. A2 cooldown increase synergizes with passive bonus damage (+3% per turn on cooldown). A3 chains to lowest HP enemy if first target dies (both hits ignore 20% DEF). Passive resets one skill cooldown per kill (once per skill). Best used for Arena nuking (Helmsmasher stacks with A3), Doom Tower control, and dungeon wave clear. Build for ATK%, C.RATE, C.DMG, SPD, and ACC (cooldown increase requires 350+ ACC in Arena).

update_notes.last_patch: MAJOR UPDATE: Added complete masteries section with Giant Slayer synergy (A1 2-3 hit multi-proc), Helmsmasher for Arena (stacks with A3 ignore 20% DEF to 45% total), Cycle of Violence (cooldown reduction synergy with passive), Kill Streak (snowball damage), Eagle Eye/Pinpoint Accuracy (high ACC for cooldown increase), and content-specific recommendations. Expanded mechanics_advisory with strategic guidance. Added validation_sources.
